channel.title: team advice and themes
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "team advice and themes"

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded:
here is a list of themes that i obtain for season 1 and going to season 2 and are almost easy for a starters

Hey, Hey, We're the Ninja! (Automatically given in a new season) gives +20 Stamina

Floating on Air (By completing The Freshest Move I've Ever Seen mission.) Hang out with the team you started the day with, but lose all ryo and friend point

Stand By Your Ninja(Automatically given in a new season) Double chance to find Allies, Items, and Ally Drops

Lucky Sevens(Get Sevens Trophy (Slot Machine in the Party House)
(Loop with Sevens Trophy in your inventory) Automatically find allies

Warstruck (Get a Letter of Marque) Get Double NWW Points

Flip Out (Automatically given in a new season) +10% XP/AP on regular missions

Good Night, Ninja (Automatically given in a new season) +1250 Friend Points to each teammate at the end of the day

Seasons Don't Fear (Get the True Blood of the Reaper) +100% HP on Bingos

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded: CLT is Crazy Love Triangle. NSY is Never Say Yaoi Bonus. Both are available in S1.

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded:
Re: team advice and themes
BvS-UzukiBvS-Uzuki 21 Mar 2008, 02:03 +0800

RSB Redux is good for B-Ranks. CLT is probably better for A-ranks due to it's higher range in addition to it's stamina return. For the super hard A-Ranks, NSY is better. However, if you've got the range covered, CLT is better.

sir what is CLT?and NSY? is this applicable in season1?

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded: Does any one know what the Bloodline-related items you can find using the legacy, Whiteeye, and Redeye Sannin themes are?

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded: I don't think you can miss Letter of Marque. I'm pretty sure you can just do it again next season. The only theme I can think of that you might be able to miss is the one where you loop as Jonin in season 2. I'm not sure if that one's available in subsequent seasons.

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded: Are there any themes that, once missed, you can never get? The only one I know of is the Letter of Marque, so I'm making sure I have that before I leave season 1 even if I have to drag my tail through it with the 50% stam penalty or whatever it is you get stuck with passed the 14 day loop point.

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded: Do Red Rover Lvl. 2 and Spot Lvl. 2 still team?

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded:
good call on that one! i might just do that ;) thx

even though i'm still waiting to win a ninjadog on the pricewheel ^^ so i can't use urination yet ^^

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded:
Say My Name is Season 2+. But goals are things to aim for.

For farming, Red Rover and Spot is probably the best combo. Otherwise, you can use a team that you'll think you'll be successful with in combination with Epic Dog Urination Technique.

You may also want to toss Terri or Lil' Bo in your party to farm either Hot Pictures of Terri or Bags of Chips and Tasty Burgers in addition to Emo.

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded:
i8 thought "say my name" can only be archieved in season 2+? but i see you are pretty optimistic about themes ;) but i'm prolly gonna try to get all those as well.

but one more question… i'm farming that heckbutterfly right now with kiba and spot so that i have 10% extra on items and ninjas. but this was my 2nd day and no freakin succes… :(… so acutally my questions is: what team would you suggest me to use? since i also need emo rock cds at some point it would make sence to dragg sasuke along as well … so tyhe team would be sasuke, spot and ?? … do you guys know any other item i should be farming? since i have to do those stupid D rank missions (wich btw annoy the s*** outta me) i might as well just farm other stuff right away. any suggestions?

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded:
Here's a list of all the themes I'm going for in S1

-All Together Now
-Drunken Fist
-My Name Is
-Seasons Don't Fear
-The Flash
-All Together Now
-Floating on Air
-Warstruck
-Teacher's Pet
-Out on Top(I Hope)

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded: RSB Redux is good for B-Ranks. CLT is probably better for A-ranks due to it's higher range in addition to it's stamina return. For the super hard A-Ranks, NSY is better. However, if you've got the range covered, CLT is better.

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded: well during my reaper missions I use MC, Timmy, and whoever speicalizes in whatever mission I'm doing(Since Im trying to find Fletch I have Shorty) and for regular missions Ima use Ro-Sham-BO Redux

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded:
thx a lot :)

but do you guys have any opinion about what team i should be using?

thark btw ;)

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded:
I'd suggest going for whatever themes you reasonably think you can get. At the very least, I'll be getting the Bankai theme, the 45+ allies theme, the Million XP theme, and the Letter of Marque theme. I'll probably go for Bruce Lvl. 2 theme as well.

I want to go for Sannin, but that'll require some village hoping, so I'm still on the ropes about that. If I do Sannin, I'll also do Out on Top.

I won't be going for Nadeshiko's theme, and probably not for the 7s theme either. Trade lvl. 2 can't be done in S1.

item.title: Re: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded:
I would definatly go for the sannin theme since you need for the impossable mission and I myself will be going for the mill XP theme since I have little jutsu I want. I might be going for the "All together now" or something like that since I have alot most allies and I have alot of Bingo style points

BTW this is Mark1

item.title: team advice and themes
item.content:encoded:
hi,

i'm a redeyed sp. taijutsu jounin lvl 34 or so and i just wanna ask what team you'd suggest me to take?! right now i'm working on getting the sasuke pics so i can get that ro-sham-bo redux team goin but then i read that love triangle or w/e is even better? what team would you suggest?

and one more thing about looping… i just read the guide about it and i'm wondering: what themes did you aim for in season one? so from season 1 to 2? the 1.000.000 XP theme? beeing a sannin maybe? would be cool if you could tell me what you did so that i can kinda see what i should be going for.
